name: Meta_Labyrinth.exe
description:
Meta_Labyrinth.exe is a fourth wall breaking game made for the Meta Game Jam 2018

It breaks the 4th wall, breaks your computer and revives it just before eliminating itself.

Post-Jam Changes:

  1. Added an actual warning about the game's requirements
  2. Made the sound scene easier
  3. Fixed the bug with the window drag
  4. Added a note for players not opening it as administrators
  5. Made the secret scene (and some more puzzles) more understandable
  6. Made the color-numbers puzzle more understandable

EVERY SINGLE CHANGE IS TEMPORARY. ALL EFFECTS ARE REVERSE-ABLE, AND YOU ARE NOT IN DANGER.

Recording Information:
If you want to record, make sure to record the entire screen.
